name: Pro-Data DeathMatch Wad #2 For DOOM ][
description: Pro-Data Deathmatch Wad #2 for DOOM ][. You start in a ready room where you pick up your weapons and some ammo before teleporting into the level. Designed for the ultimate deathmatch battle! There are secret alcoves, traps, weapons and powerups. Every weapon is available on the level. And, yes, there is an exit.
